text: Chibi: "Hey. Everyone suffering from withdrawal symptoms."
Tachibana: "We have absolutely no dependencies, so it's not hard or anything for us, but how about everyone?"
Tachibana: "Are you suffering?"
Tachibana: "I'd be happy if you're suffering."
You: "That's kind of mean..."
You: "What's this? Why did you suddenly call me? I'm sleepy."
You: "It's 2 a.m."
Tachibana: "Well, well. We're not sleepy so it's fine for us."
You: "Just because you guys are fine doesn't mean I am!"
Chibi: "Hey, hey, little buddy."
Chibi: "Aren't you hungry?"
Chibi: "There's yokan."
You: "Are you a Japanese grandma?!"
You: "Who needs yokan in the middle of the night! Just let me sleep!"
Tachibana: "Would apple pie be better?"
You: "Is this the West?!"
You: "A Western grandma?! I don't even know!"
You: "Do Western grandmas really make apple pies for their grandkids or what?! Who knows!"
Tachibana: "You're really on fire..."
Chibi: "Maybe He isn't actually sleepy..."
You: "I said! I said I'm sleepy! Let me sleep!"
You: "Or just get it over with! Please!"
Tachibana: "Your face looks like a pickled plum..."
Chibi: "Got it. Let's get to the main topic."
Tachibana: "Well, I think around the second day is when it's really tough for everyone to keep abstinent."
Tachibana: "For example, even if you look at the graph or Soyokazedo Bank, there isn't much data so there's no visual motivation boost."
Chibi: "Same for the graph and the amount saved. If it goes up, it's fun, but if it's low, it's not fun to look at yet."
Tachibana: "Right, that's why we came to encourage everyoneâ€”the users."
You: "I see."
You: "Alright, good night."
Tachibana: "Don't sleep! Wait! We haven't even started the main topic yet!"
You: "Enough already! I'm just sleepy!"
You: "There's no way this had to be done in the middle of the night! Could've done it during the day!"
Tachibana: "Alright! I'll get it done quickly!"
Chibi: "Basically, it's hard at first, but after about 30 days it gets easier, so hang in there until then."
Tachibana: "Yeah. During these 30 days, we'll keep delivering events. We'll add them to Soyokazedo too."
Chibi: "We'll keep adding features too, as long as it doesn't get too heavy. Sorry if it gets a bit heavier."
Tachibana: "Like, it might be good to have a feature that randomly picks people who started on the same day and automatically sets them as rivals."
Chibi: "Ah, that's good. I want to watch them fight like beetles."
You: "Don't treat users like beetles!"
You: "And what's with these old ladies popping up everywhere?!"
You: "What does this have to do with Tachibana?!"
Tachibana: "Don't you know? It's that 'Obaachans' show on Netflix."
Chibi: "They defeat the Demon King at the end."
You: "I don't know that! What a crap drama!"
You: "And it doesn't look like they're defeating it here!"
You: "It looks like they're taming it instead!"
You: "Kieeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!"
Tachibana: "What's with this high energy...?"
Chibi: "This person's too hyped up from sleepiness..."
Tachibana: "Well, anyway..."
Tachibana: "I want to add lots of playful features. I have lots of ideas."
Chibi: "Yeah, me too. Anyway, we'll keep updating, so it'd be great if you turn notifications on."
You: "There are still a bunch of characters who haven't appeared yet. If you keep working on your abstinence, you'll meet them someday."
You: "Can I sleep now?"
Tachibana: "Yeah, it's fine now."
You: "Alright. Good night."
Tachibana: "Good night."
Tachibana: "Well, let's go to bed too. Chibi, let's sleep."
Chibi: "Yeah. Everyone, go to bed already. I don't know what time you're reading this, though."
Chibi: "Well then, good night everyone."
Tachibana: "Good night, everyone!"
